item.description:
Venez faire le patin à glace samedi le 16 janvier à 15hr au Thayer Warburton Arena à Warwick RI !

Oui, come & ice skate in a joint meetup between the Providence French Language Meetup Group and the Newport French Conversation MeetUp Group! This Saturday at 3pm! Allez-y!

The Blurb:
The two French Meetup groups between Providence and Newport are coming together in Warwick for some laughter (will Stephane seriously wear a tutu because he thinks it means you can skate even if you never have tried?), bonhomie and of course ice skating of all levels! Trust me, I'll be wearing my rollerblading knee, elbow and wrist protectors because I'm not exactly co-ordinated but do love to go fast..! If we're lucky, Suzette will show us how to do some jumps and turns.

The Details:
This event takes place indoors this Saturday 16 Jan 2010 at the Thayer Warburton Ice Arena at 975 Sandy Lane, Warwick RI 02886. Public skating on Saturdays is open from 3:15pm to 5pm. We'll meet at 2:45pm in the carpark to work out how many people need to hire skates and then send them across to the Ice Skater's Edge for their rentals.

Entry to the Ice Arena costs $3 and skate rentals are approximately $5.

After skating, those still standing will go for a coffee or a drink at a nearby cafe to relax and laugh some more. If people want to go for dinner, then suggestions should be posted for possible restaurants in the area that will accept a group of sweaty skaters who are speaking Frenglish!

Plus d'info:
Thayer Warburton Arenas - 975 Sandy Lane, Warwick, RI 02886 Ph (401) 738-2000
http://www.warwickri....
Ice Skaters Edge 6 Freeborne Street, Warwick, RI 02886 ph: 401-732-5252

A samedi!
Stevie (who only learnt to skate in Feb 2009!)

group.name: The Providence French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Let's go iceskating with the Newport French Conversation Meetup Group!
